panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (5m avg)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)

targets.expr: (((count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{exporter_name="node_exporter", instance="nginx", job="other_exporters"}) by (cpu))) - avg(sum by (mode)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode='idle',exporter_name="node_exporter", instance="nginx", job="other_exporters"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100) / count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{exporter_name="node_exporter", instance="nginx", job="other_exporters"}) by (cpu))
